title: gullobhai
author: gullobhai
content: DEAR FELLOWS I AM STUDENT WANNA ONLINE PART TIME WORK, PLZ SUGGEST ME ON WHICH PLATFORUM CAN I START WORK AND SUGGEST SOME ONLINE SKILL FOR LEARNING AS I CONTINOUE MY STUDY WITH FINANICAL FREEDOM

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Here's my advice for you, learn to develop yourself first with skill acquisitions, learn something new which you have interest in, once you got yourself equiped then it help create that value in you which could be a solution to someone's need and as for this platform here, its not a get rich quick schemes, it will do you good as well if you can devote time, make personal discoveries and build up your knowledge about Cryptocurrency in general, maybe it could be one of your greatest asset to open ways, but the truth is that you must start from somewhere.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: To begin with, I would advise you not to use capital letters because it is not considered appropriate for the forum, so turn off the caps lock. When you do that, look at your post history and ask yourself if you don't already have an online job since you are an active bounty hunter?If you want a better online job, you will still have to work a little harder to develop some new and sought-after skills, and programmers, web designers and web security experts are always in demand. Maybe you already have some skills that you can offer to the forum members? In that case visit Services

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 30, 2022, 06:40:11 AMDEAR FELLOWS I AM STUDENT WANNA ONLINE PART TIME WORK, PLZ SUGGEST ME ON WHICH PLATFORUM CAN I START WORK AND SUGGEST SOME ONLINE SKILL FOR LEARNING AS I CONTINOUE MY STUDY WITH FINANICAL FREEDOM Weird though,if you want to learn something it's better to start at proper usage of capital letters as no company is going to hire you if you even don't know how to used it? If English is not your first language so I would suggest as well to use online tools like https://www.grammarly.com/.For starters: https://www.upwork.com/.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: OP, you are actively distributing tips for making money in neighboring topics. I have read your posts. You can do the same. Freelancing sites are always happy to see people who can offer their skills and abilities. Another question is what do you know?If you are a student, try to study well, and you are attracted by IT technologies, judging by your posts, move in this direction.But participating in a bounty will take up valuable study time, so you first need to make a choice. Will you study, or participate in a bounty?

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: See there are lot of ways you can earn but there are different skillset you will need for it and you need to specify if you have any skill for the same?See if you have technical knowledge like familiar of programming language then you can apply for the job based on front end or backend developerIf you have some writing abilities and can make your blogs then you can find that way If you have knowledge about art then you can provide freelance services or participate in some art contest on the forum also.You can visit service section with the link mentioned above or you can also visit  Collectibles  board if you are into physical goods.There are many platforms like Upwork where you can have you service and someone interested can contact you or hire you from there but only skill needs to be there.Or if not then learn anyone of them to provide you financial stability in the future.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 30, 2022, 06:40:11 AMDEAR FELLOWS I AM STUDENT WANNA ONLINE PART TIME WORK, PLZ SUGGEST ME ON WHICH PLATFORUM CAN I START WORK AND SUGGEST SOME ONLINE SKILL FOR LEARNING AS I CONTINOUE MY STUDY WITH FINANICAL FREEDOM Maybe if you can share with us your skills and interest then it will easier for us to point you to the right way. You can try working on Upwork or Services section of the forum since you are asking for a general freelance job online and that’s the best place to look for a job hiring. You can try also to search on linkedin about job that interest because most company post there hiring advertisement there since that is the social media place for all professional people and it’s all about connect with jobs and company you work with.Finding freelance job is very tough but if you have an impressive skills on something that company usually needed then it will be easy for you to find one on the right platform.

comments.author: alik111
comments.body: To learn about crypto I will suggest to be active in this forum and search about the topic which you want to know. And I can also suggest if you want to earn a passive income then you must join bounties and other campaigns which is available for all in the bounty section.

comments.author: Yawa2020
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 30, 2022, 06:40:11 AMDEAR FELLOWS I AM STUDENT WANNA ONLINE PART TIME WORK, PLZ SUGGEST ME ON WHICH PLATFORUM CAN I START WORK AND SUGGEST SOME ONLINE SKILL FOR LEARNING AS I CONTINOUE MY STUDY WITH FINANICAL FREEDOM First of all I will advice you to improve yourself with the use of English and your writing skills since you seems to focus on online work. No any serious and legit online platform will tolerate deficiency in both writing and speaking fluently when it comes to English because that's the accepted universal language for communication. Additionally, Google and YouTube is there for you whenever you're ready to learn any online skills aside being a bounty hunter.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 30, 2022, 06:40:11 AMDEAR FELLOWS I AM STUDENT WANNA ONLINE PART TIME WORK, PLZ SUGGEST ME ON WHICH PLATFORUM CAN I START WORK AND SUGGEST SOME ONLINE SKILL FOR LEARNING AS I CONTINOUE MY STUDY WITH FINANICAL FREEDOM I see in your profile that you are 19 y/o. You could be qualified to some freelance platforms like Upwork which according to their ToS that you might need to be at least 18.  I would advise you to fix your writing first, OP since that kind of writing ain't going to budge the first place in freelance platforms which is the approval of profile.Skills that are in-demand in that platform as of writing this were mostly web dev which is also my niche since every business owners out there are always looking for someone to build website for their businesses. If you are really desperate to earn quickly, you could go for data entry, but it is extremely saturated and highly competitive and it might take a while for you to land your first job there.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 30, 2022, 06:40:11 AMDEAR FELLOWS I AM STUDENT WANNA ONLINE PART TIME WORK, PLZ SUGGEST ME ON WHICH PLATFORUM CAN I START WORK AND SUGGEST SOME ONLINE SKILL FOR LEARNING AS I CONTINOUE MY STUDY WITH FINANICAL FREEDOM Learn a skill, that's all I can tell you, whatever type of skill you wanna learn is up to you, I will point you to some, incase if you are like "what should you learn"1. You can learn web development and design 2. You can learn graphic design3. You can learn photoshopping4. You can learn video editing5. You can learn to build Android and IOS applications6. You can learn web programming7. You can learn online marketing8. You can learn search engine optimization(SEO)9. You can learn blockchain development10. You can learn how to create animations.There are countless of skills you can learn, you can even learn how to play piano, and start playing for local churches to get paid, several of this skills are skills you can learn all by yourself, all you have to do is buy the video courses online, you can find courses to several skills on udemy and the likes.Give yourself time to acquiring one or more of the above skills, and in a few years from now, you wouldn't have to ask this type of question again.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: To be financially free doesn't come that easy. It takes sacrifice, eagerness to learn, risks, patience and thinking out of the box to make in life.  Are you ready for all that?You should, first of all, learn and have experience with online jobs before starting work. you can start by learning any of these online jobs: Programming, video editing, content creator or web design. Use your free time to learn any of the online jobs of your choice but don't let it collide with your studies

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 30, 2022, 06:40:11 AMDEAR FELLOWS I AM STUDENT WANNA ONLINE PART TIME WORK, PLZ SUGGEST ME ON WHICH PLATFORUM CAN I START WORK What is your course? What skill do currently you have? If none, you can start with those data entry posts but they're like having the most competition because of the difficulty of it which is easy.Quote from: gullobhai on August 30, 2022, 06:40:11 AMAND SUGGEST SOME ONLINE SKILL FOR LEARNING AS I CONTINOUE MY STUDY WITH FINANICAL FREEDOM There are these online academies like Coursera, udemy, Harvard online, and many more. There are plenty of them and you only need to allot time for you to study just at home. You'll get certified there but most of their certifications like professionally have a payment and that's why you can't avail of these courses at the moment. You need to land a job first that's easy for you based on your skillset and save money from your salary there.
